cards.rules_text: Whenever Pathrazer Viking deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice a land.

cards.flavor_text: [i]The Vikings kept their largest warriors on the front lines in order to part the seas of enemies. The maulers charge directly after, crushing skulls in their wake.[/i]
